definition: singing voice/fig. original voice of a poet

sentences.english: It is divided into two parts: principal structure and ecological structure.
sentences.chinese: 哭嫁歌分为主体结构和生态结构两个部分。

sentences.english: Take a sad song and make it better.
sentences.chinese: 找一首哀伤的歌，把它唱得更快乐。

sentences.english: Song of XuSong taste carefully, not as one of the move.
sentences.chinese: 仔细品味许嵩的歌，不免为之一动。

sentences.english: As he, in his swooning ears, the choir's amen.
sentences.chinese: 神魂颠倒的耳中，只想听到唱诗班的歌。

sentences.english: I can play "Spinning Song" quite well now.
sentences.chinese: 我现在能把“织布歌”全弹下来了。

sentences.english: I know, you must now be in very hard very hard practice songs.
sentences.chinese: 我知道，你现在一定在很努力很努力的练歌吧。

sentences.english: This song have got a lot of awards in hong kong.
sentences.chinese: 曾经攞过好多合唱歌曲奖既歌。

sentences.english: Below gave everyone a good feeling villages light rock song.
sentences.chinese: 下面送给大家一首好听的乡村轻摇滚感觉的歌。

sentences.english: You know, I've never heard you sing.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，我还没听你唱过歌哪。

sentences.english: She meant for me to learn Spanish through Shakira's songs.
sentences.chinese: 她当时是想让我通过听夏奇拉的歌学好西班牙语。

sentences.english: Try making up the words to one of your favorite songs, and sing it out loud.
sentences.chinese: 记住你最喜欢的歌的歌词，并大声的唱出来。

sentences.english: I like Li Xiaoyun's songs very much.
sentences.chinese: 说实在的，我很喜欢李霄云的歌。

sentences.english: Han Jia, what did you sing just now?
sentences.chinese: 哎韩佳，刚才你唱的是什么歌？

sentences.english: Play that song You and I listened to .
sentences.chinese: 播放那首我们曾聆听过的歌吧。

sentences.english: Quiet mornings. Sing-a-long songs with my toddlers in the car.
sentences.chinese: 与我的小宝贝在车里唱一首悠长的歌。

sentences.english: The album's title track is climbing high on the Country chart.
sentences.chinese: 这张专辑的主打歌，是对国家攀登高图表。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
head/chief/first (occasion, thing etc)/classifier for poems, songs etc
to sing opera music (without staging or make up)
